about.EN: Land cover (degradation)These plots show the mean annual greenness, total annual precipitation, and land cover type for the last 20 years in this site.
Satellite image for the year {YEAR_END} centered around the site location.

This map shows mean annual greenness for the period {YEAR_START} - {YEAR_END}. Darker green areas indicate more abundant and healthier vegetation throughout the year. Yellow colors indicate areas with bare soil or sparse vegetation.

This map shows the changes in annual greenness for the period {YEAR_START} - {YEAR_END}. Green areas have increased vegetation abundance or health during the period, yellow show stable areas and purple areas in which vegetation abundance or health has declined.
